name: py-google-auth

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-cachetools
dependencies.description:
This module provides various memoizing collections and decorators,
including variants of the Python 3 Standard Library @lru_cache function
decorator.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyasn1-modules
dependencies.description:
A collection of ASN.1 modules expressed in form of pyasn1 classes.
Includes protocols PDUs definition (SNMP, LDAP etc.) and various data
structures (X.509, PKCS etc.).

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-google-auth-oauthlib
dependent_to.description: This library provides oauthlib integration with google-auth.

dependent_to.name: py-gcsfs
dependent_to.description: Pythonic file-system for Google Cloud Storage.

dependent_to.name: py-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: Official Python client library for kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-gsutil
dependent_to.description: A command line tool for interacting with cloud storage services.

dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-core
dependent_to.description: Google Cloud API client core library.

dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-batch
dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Batch API client library.

dependent_to.name: py-earthengine-api
dependent_to.description:
This package allows developers to interact with Google Earth Engine
using the Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-storage
dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Storage API client library.

dependent_to.name: py-google-api-python-client
dependent_to.description:
The Google API Client for Python is a client library for accessing the
Plus, Moderator, and many other Google APIs.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorboard
dependent_to.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.

dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-appengine-logging
dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Appengine Logging API client library.
